tool_description: Converts ZPL instruction to different format (like PDF)
name: ZPL Converter
title: ZPL Converter

api_list.name: Convert
api_list.description: You can pass ZPL instruction and you will receive Base64 string of destination element with destination format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zpl-converter.p.rapidapi.com/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zpl-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
